text: I ll begin to blog on here before I end it on Christmas Eve There was one person who got me through the worst of times  They stuck it through with me and I stuck it through with them  Our bond and connection never faltered because of how close we have been up until now  The achievements I made and happiness I thrived was a product of our bond  a true fruit of our labor  But now it s as if the work to cultivate that fruit is forgotten  In the matter of a few days  a relationship of   years was destroyed not by wrongdoing but by her simple choice  This holiday and this next decade is one of opportunity and growth  Without her I have none  so I have decided to end it on Christmas Eve with  mg of Benadryl and alcohol  A near painless death in sleep  My decision has been made and as I experience the raw pain every day until the  th  I will express to the world my story

text: Don t know how to copeHi  I m not really sure how to start but I ve been contemplating the idea of suicide for a while  about   years now  I m too much of a coward to do it but recently the urge has been getting stronger and stronger  I lack close friends who I can open up to so I ve never actually told anyone and would feel bad if did  Every day I wish I wouldn t wake up and I cry most nights due to being a reject in school  and at home  since my parents refuse to give me attention of pleasure in life  It s currently Ramadan and I m struggling living due to fasting  I m   but weigh  kg but my parents don t care and say it s good for me  I refuse to eat and take my anger out on food so recently I ve just been eating less and less and it s making me hate my body more and more  I ve also recently gotten a government issued student loan which my mum wants because I m not to be trusted  I m   and it s the one thing I ve been looking forward to for a month now since I can do a bit of shopping for myself  Today she s said if she doesn t get it by the end of the week  I ll have to start paying rent and start paying for the food I get  I m also a Muslim cursed with sexuality problems and I don t know what I did to have caused such a thing but I ve been living my entire life a lie and I can t tell anyone since the friends I do have have publicly made it known that they don t accept LGBT people and wouldn t be friends with them so idk how to change my feelings towards genders  The main thing that s been holding me from ending myself is not being able to see how happy my family would be  I don t think they like me  and life right now is just hard to deal with now that I m being starved  Sorry for posting this if it s unserious enough  I just wanted to let a few people know a bit about me before soon maybe I do die
summary: Suicide is an idea that has been niggling at her mind for a long time, but she's afraid to tell anyone as she doesn't have any close friends.
